verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My country, 'tis of Thee, newline Sweet land of liberty, newline Of Thee I sing: newline Land where my fathers died, newline Land of the pilgrims' pride, newline From every mountain side newline Let freedom ring!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My native country, thee, newline Land of the noble, free, newline Thy name I love: newline I love Thy rocks and rills, newline Thy woods and templed hill; newline My heart with rapture thrills newline Like that above.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let music swell the breeze, newline And ring from all the trees newline Sweet freedom's song: newline Let mortal tongues awake; newline Let all that breathe partake; newline Let rocks their silence break, newline The sound prolong.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Our fathers' God, to Thee, newline Author of liberty, newline To Thee we sing: newline Long may our land be bright newline With freedom's holy light; newline Protect us by Thy might, newline Great God, our King!
